checkerDesc: A syntax error.
An invalid inline option..
An unpaired inline push directive。
An unpaired inline pop directive。
Setting an undefined global variable。[规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#global-variables-1xx)
errExample:
a = {b=1,[1] = 2, {}, 4, 5, "abc", function() end} 
 foo {123, b = 456, {789}, function() a = {1} end}

checkerDesc: Mutating an undefined global variable。Try to use local to define variables so that they are not misused as global variables and pollute the namespace[规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#global-variables-1xx)

Accessing an undefined global variable.Try to use local to define variables so that they are not misused as global variables and pollute the namespace[规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#global-variables-1xx)

Setting a read-only global variable. By default, most standard globals and fields are marked as read-only, so that setting them produces a warning.  [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#global-variables-1xx)

Setting a read-only field of a global variable. By default, most standard globals and fields are marked as read-only, so that setting them produces a warning.  [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#global-variables-1xx)
Unused implicitly defined global variable. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#global-variables-1xx)
Setting an undefined field of a global variable. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#global-variables-1xx)
Accessing an undefined field of a global variable. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#global-variables-1xx)
Unused local variable [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
Unused argument. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
The loop variable is not in use. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
Local variable is accessed but never set. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
Local variable is set but never accessed. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
An argument is set but never accessed. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
Loop variable is set but never accessed. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
Local variables change, but are never accessed. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
Value assigned to a local variable is unused. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
Value of an argument is unused. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
Value of a loop variable is unused. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
Value of a field in a table literal is unused.  [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
Accessing uninitialized local variable.  [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
Value assigned to a local variable is mutated but never accessed. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
Mutating uninitialized local variable. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
Redefining a local variable.   [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#shadowing-declarations-4xx)
errExample:
local function f(x) 
 end 
 local function f(x)
 end

checkerDesc: Redefining an argument. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#shadowing-declarations-4xx)
errExample:
local function f(x)
   	 local x = x or "default" -- bad
 end
rightExample:
local function f(x)
   x = x or "default" -- bad
 end

checkerDesc: Redefining a loop variable. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#shadowing-declarations-4xx)
Shadowing a local variable. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#shadowing-declarations-4xx)
Shadowing an argument. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#shadowing-declarations-4xx)
Shadowing a loop variable. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#shadowing-declarations-4xx)
Shadowing an upvalue. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#shadowing-declarations-4xx)
Shadowing an upvalue argument. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#shadowing-declarations-4xx)
Shadowing an upvalue loop variable.[规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#shadowing-declarations-4xx)
Unreachable code. foe example:  [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#control-flow-and-data-flow-issues-5xx)
errExample:
for i = 1, 100 do
   	-- Break statement is outside the `if` block,
	   -- so that the loop always stops after the first iteration.
	   if cond(i) then f() end break
 end

checkerDesc: Loop can be executed at most once.  [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#control-flow-and-data-flow-issues-5xx)
Unused label, Labels that are not used by any goto statements are reported as unused. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#control-flow-and-data-flow-issues-5xx)
Left-hand side of an assignment is too short. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#control-flow-and-data-flow-issues-5xx)
Left-hand side of an assignment is too long. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#control-flow-and-data-flow-issues-5xx)
An empty do end block. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#control-flow-and-data-flow-issues-5xx)
An empty if branch. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#control-flow-and-data-flow-issues-5xx)

An empty statement. In Lua 5.2+ semicolons are considered statements and can appear even when not following normal statements. Such semicolons produce Luacheck warnings as they are completely useless. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#control-flow-and-data-flow-issues-5xx)
Cyclomatic complexity of a function is too high. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#control-flow-and-data-flow-issues-5xx)
A numeric for loop goes from #(expr) down to 1 or less without negative step, [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#control-flow-and-data-flow-issues-5xx)
errExample:
for i = #t, 1 do
	   print(t[i])
 end  
 correct for example: 
 for i = #t, 1, -1 do
   	print(t[i])
 end

checkerDesc: A line consists of nothing but whitespace. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#formatting-issues-6xx)

A line contains trailing whitespace. Remove unnecessary Spaces at the end of the line.  Any tabs or spaces after either ) would be considered trailing.
Any tabs or spaces after the . in the comment would be considered trailing
Any tabs or spaces on the empty line between the two print statements would also be considered a form of trailing whitespace.[规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#formatting-issues-6xx)
Trailing whitespace in a string. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#formatting-issues-6xx)
Trailing whitespace in a comment. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#formatting-issues-6xx)
Inconsistent indentation (SPACE followed by TAB). [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#formatting-issues-6xx)
Line is too long. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#formatting-issues-6xx)
